infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BunnyVision needs access to your camera to allow you to take photos and use our image recognition feature.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BunnyVision needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload images for recognition.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: BunnyVision needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload images for recognition.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you share photos with your friends.
